ygData.subject: Re: 2 EQ accounts for sale
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Please not flame each other over personal beliefs. Everyone sees things over certain perspectives. 2) The post Storm posted was simply saying-- don t
ygData.messageBody:
1) Please not flame each other over personal
beliefs. Everyone sees things over certain
perspectives.<br><br>2) The post Storm posted was simply saying-- don't
throw stones... Hope I put that tactfully. Sorry if I
didn't.<br><br>3) And the other things is-- Storm wasn't saying
that selling accounts isn't illegal. However, you can
and ppl do pay other characters to PL. That's not
selling an item or an account and in no way violates your
user agreement terms.<br><br>4) I totally agree with
Oakenwulf-- accounts bought and accounts PL'd have ppl that
don't really work well in groups and can make it really
rough at times.<br><br>5) Don't believe Storm's
comments were directed toward Oak...<br><br>shooman
out<br><br>PS... again... hope I phrased that
tactfully.<br><br>Fatedhue Prismatic
